name: A. Little Elephant and Bits
statement:
The Little Elephant has an integer , written in the binary notation. He
wants to write this number on a piece of paper.To make sure that the
number fits on the piece of paper, the Little Elephant to delete exactly
one any digit from number in the binary record. At that a new number
appears. It consists of the remaining binary digits, written in the
corresponding order (possible, with leading zeroes).The Little Elephant
wants the number he is going to write on the paper to be as large as
possible. Help him find the maximum number that he can obtain after
deleting exactly one binary digit and print it in the binary notation.
